inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [(illegible) 33] and [54 (?--upside down)]
markings: on back, stamped in red: [ATELIER / ED. DEGAS]
provenance: Edgar Degas, L.657 (1834-1917), Paris. [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2006; sold in August for NRL.TO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2006-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le meme jour, ma chére!  me laisser siffler deux hommes, dieu!
